name: BE A SURGEON Medical Simulator
description:
It's time to put on gloves and prove your worth!

You play as a character named Zack Starks, the new surgeon of the Confidence Hospital. Get the job and prove your worth to reach the top!
Improve your skill as a surgeon and perform simple and advanced operations.

Discover the fascinating story of this young surgeon and destroy the evil plans of a bio-terrorist organization, you will fight against the most lethal strains.


A FASCINATING SURGEON EXPERIENCE AWAITS YOU:

● Use your applied skills to solve the puzzle of each surgery.

● Perform all types of surgeries, routine interventions, excisions of tumors and strains created by bioterrorists.

● A thrilling story.

● 9 different types of tools.

● Awaken the power within you.


Languages: English, Spanish
